item.description:
The Second Annual Lone Gull 10K is on September 21, 2008
Race along the back shore of historic Gloucester and enjoy spectacular views of the Atlantic Ocean and Eastern Point. It is certain that this scenic, USATF certified course with its rolling hills is one of the most breathtaking stretches of coast in New England. I have ran this race last year, and had a great experience, their T-shirt was real nice, and they have real Breakfast after the run!

I have already registered and I thought someone else maybe interested in checking this out. Please click here to read the race details.


Event website
http://www.lonegull10...

Event Registration (Online)
https://www.baystatee...


Please note:
Members are responsible for required registration and only registered members should RSVP 'YES' (Please comment your RSVP as 'Registered').
The registration fee is $20

Directions:
Route 128 North to first rotary. Take second exit off the rotary. Follow 128 Extension to lights. Take left onto Eastern Ave./127. Follow 1/2 mile to Shaw's Plaza and make immediate right onto Barn Lane. At bottom of hill take a left onto Thatcher Road and follow for 1/2 mile. Good Harbor entrance is on the right.

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: The Third Annual Lone Gull 10K
